trackShipmentTitle: Enter your shipment code to track
bannerTitle: Deliver What You Love, On Time
bannerBody: Deliver your products to any place with a one-stop, full-service next-day delivery and logistics solution.
aboutDescription: We contributes to community development by providing a range of commercial services that support the development plan. We have the honor to offer our customers various services in the field of shipping, unloading and cash collection services (C.O.D) as soon as possible with competitive prices. We offer our services through a group of highly qualified and challenging management.
aboutPoints: We offer a vast ground network that allows you to ship everywhere
We offer numerous shipping services if you need your shipment to arrive on the second business day
We offer value-added services such as pickup and delivery options, delivery notification, and special handling

serviceSections.title: Air Freight
serviceSections.body: Inbound and outbound airfreight services with most professional, cost effective and timely manner

serviceSections.title: Ocean Freight
serviceSections.body: Complete range of ocean freight services for full-container loads, consolidated cargo shipments

serviceSections.title: Domestic Shipping
serviceSections.body: We offer next day door delivery ,on-demand time-definite and same day delivery with tracking

serviceSections.title: Cash Collection
serviceSections.body: Manage your cash flow by monitoring collected cash and pending invoices through cash collection service

serviceSections.title: Warehousing
serviceSections.body: We store and manage your inventory in our logistics centers offering bonded or duty-paid options

serviceSections.title: Express Shipping
serviceSections.body: We offer express delivery service anywhere within the same city within two to three hours only

featureSections.title: Track orders
featureSections.body: Monitor & track your shipments online from placing the order till delivery through the company's website or through the company's application

featureSections.title: Manage COD
featureSections.body: We also offer cash collection and cash on delivery (COD) services as an option for all our customers without any additional fees

featureSections.title: E-commerce Fulfillment
featureSections.body: We handle your e-commerce, from securely storing your products in our strategically located facilities, carefully packaging and shipping, to securely managing cash collection and return process

featureSections.title: Door to door
featureSections.body: We receive your shipment from your home and deliver to the customer's home

statisticsTitle: Some Important Statistics That Will Make You Satisfied...
statisticsBody: Deliver your products to any place with a one-stop, full-service next-day delivery and logistics solution.
